abilities.description: Your parrot companion offers random wisdom. When you seek inspiration, context, or direction, use your oracle dice to choose a table (1–25: @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.sunderedislesoracles.109883b4bcba1339]{Action}, 26–50: @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.sunderedislesoracles.ce3644703a52b2bd]{Theme}, 51–75: @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.sunderedislesoracles.0736f5a2702af5df]{Descriptor}, 76–100: @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.sunderedislesoracles.09f9e38b2637e39d]{Focus}). Then, roll to learn what your parrot says. If you connect this prompt to your current situation for new insight, take +1 momentum.
Once per fight, when you score a miss, you may envision how the parrot appears on the scene to cause a timely distraction. If you do, make it a strong hit instead.

The parrot squawks a warning when danger is near. When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.e6ed148eff82c171]{Face Danger} to detect a threat, or if you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.2f2ba4090b22a122]{Enter the Fray} against an ambush, add +its health.
